column4: guys i have ubuntu 10.04 and skype 4.0 and when i make conversation and the other girl turn on her camera i can see her but when i turn on mine.. there is this constant glitch any idea how to fix it ? i see this in my terminal libv4l2: error allocating conversion buffer
Sounds like your camera is not supported properly.
any idea how to support my camera properly, Alexi i have Linux marla 2.6.32-41-generic-pae
Would need to know the exact make and model of your camera.
That was for you.. A QuickCam? I need a model dude. Not just a brand.
http://www.dkbilgisayar.com/content_files/prd_images/logitech_quickcam_express.jpg this is my camera ;( i dont know the model
SO, yes, the QuickCam Express V-UAP41
so my camera is old or what? and btw now when only i turn on my camera .. its ok.. but when she turns on her camera or share screen then its meessed up
lsusb | |grep Logitech   And paste me the one line referencing your camera, please.
Ahhh, that sounds more like a bug in Skype,.
Bus 005 Device 002: ID 046d:092f Logitech, Inc. QuickCam Express Plus
That's a pretty old camera, yes. Supported back in 7.04-7.04, and no longer really maintained, so may not be perfect.
So, either the camera, or Skype is not working properly.
Based on your changes in Skype, I'd point my finger there.
so its my skype fault not my camera?
That'd be my first guess, yes.
